\usepackage{mdframed} 
\newenvironment{rationale}[1][]{\begin{mdframed}[backgroundcolor=MSLightBlue, topline=false, leftline = false, rightline = false, bottomline = false] \textbf{#1}\\[2ex]}{\end{mdframed}}

% %    TABULAR TABLE % %
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% 
\usepackage{array} 
\newcolumntype{L}[1]{>{\raggedright\let\newline\\\arraybackslash\hspace{0pt}}m{#1}} 
\newcolumntype{C}[1]{>{\centering\let\newline\\\arraybackslash\hspace{0pt}}m{#1}} 
\newcolumntype{R}[1]{>{\raggedleft\let\newline\\\arraybackslash\hspace{0pt}}m{#1}}   

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% % %    formal environment % %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% % for adjustwidth environment 

\usepackage[strict]{changepage}   % for formal definitions 
\usepackage{framed}   % environment derived from framed.sty: see leftbar environment definition 
\definecolor{formalshade}{rgb}{0.95,0.95,1}   
\newenvironment{formal}{%   
\def\FrameCommand{%     
\hspace{1pt}%     
{\color{MSBlue}\vrule width 2pt}%
{\color{MSBlue}\vrule width 4pt}%     
\colorbox{MSLightBlue}%   
}%   
\MakeFramed{\advance\hsize-\width\FrameRestore}%   
\noindent\hspace{-4.55pt}% disable indenting first paragraph   
\begin{adjustwidth}{}{7pt}%   
    \vspace{2pt}\vspace{2pt}% 
    } 
    {%   
    \vspace{2pt}\end{adjustwidth}\endMakeFramed% 
    }   
    
\usepackage{sectsty,ulem}   
\sectionfont{\color{darkblue}}
\color{darkblue}

\newcommand{\bydef}{\equiv\xspace} 
\newcommand{\epsilonb}{\ensuremath{\boldsymbol{\epsilon}}\xspace} 
\newcommand{\mub}{\ensuremath{\boldsymbol{\mu}}\xspace} 
\newcommand{\iotab}{\ensuremath{\boldsymbol{\iota}}\xspace} 
\newcommand{\betab}{\ensuremath{\boldsymbol{\beta}}\xspace} 
\newcommand{\sigmab}{\ensuremath{\boldsymbol{\sigma}}\xspace} 
\newcommand{\Sigmab}{\ensuremath{\boldsymbol{\Sigma}}\xspace} 
\newcommand{\zerob}{\ensuremath{\mathbf{0}}\xspace} 
\newcommand{\varepsilonb}{\ensuremath{\boldsymbol{\varepsilon}}\xspace} 
\newcommand{\xib}{\ensuremath{\boldsymbol{\xi}}\xspace}   
\newcommand{\mkt}{\ensuremath{\text{mkt}}\xspace} 
\newcommand{\ew}{\ensuremath{\text{ew}}\xspace} 
\newcommand{\erc}{\ensuremath{\text{erc}}\xspace} 
\newcommand{\Oneb}{\ensuremath{\boldsymbol{1}}\xspace} 
\newcommand{\Ib}{\ensuremath{\boldsymbol{I}}\xspace} 
\newcommand{\Jb}{\ensuremath{\boldsymbol{J}}\xspace}

\newcommand{\wminL}{\ensuremath{\wb_\text{min-L1}}\xspace}

\newcommand{\wirerc}{\ensuremath{\wb_\text{ir-erc}}\xspace}
